org.apache.juneau.transforms

Class CalendarSwap.DateLong

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.transform.PojoSwap<T,String>
      • org.apache.juneau.transform.StringSwap<Calendar>
        • org.apache.juneau.transforms.CalendarSwap
          • org.apache.juneau.transforms.CalendarSwap.DateLong
  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarSwap

    public static class CalendarSwap.DateLong
extends CalendarSwap
    Transforms Calendars to DateFormat.LONG date strings.
    Example Output:
    • "March 3, 2001" // en_US
    • "2001/03/03" // ja_JP
    • "2001년 3월 3일 (토)" // ko_KR

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.juneau.transforms.CalendarSwap

    • Method Detail

      • unswap

        public Calendar unswap(BeanSession session,
                       String o,
                       ClassMeta<?> hint)
                throws Exception
        Description copied from class: PojoSwap
        If this transform is to be used to reconstitute POJOs that aren't true Java beans, it must implement this method.
        Overrides:
        unswap in class StringSwap<Calendar>
        Parameters:
        session - The bean session to use to get the class meta. This is always going to be the same bean context that created this swap.
        o - The transformed object.
        hint - If possible, the parser will try to tell you the object type being created. For example, on a serialized date, this may tell you that the object being created must be of type GregorianCalendar.
        This may be null if the parser cannot make this determination.
        Returns:
        The narrowed object.
        Throws:
        Exception - If this method is not implemented.

      • swap

        public String swap(BeanSession session,
                   Calendar o)
            throws Exception
        Description copied from class: PojoSwap
        If this transform is to be used to serialize non-serializable POJOs, it must implement this method.

        The object must be converted into one of the following serializable types:

        • String
        • Number
        • Boolean
        • Collection containing anything on this list.
        • Map containing anything on this list.
        • A java bean with properties of anything on this list.
        • An array of anything on this list.
        Overrides:
        swap in class StringSwap<Calendar>
        Parameters:
        session - The bean session to use to get the class meta. This is always going to be the same bean context that created this swap.
        o - The object to be transformed.
        Returns:
        The transformed object.
        Throws:
        Exception - If a problem occurred trying to convert the output.
